title: The loyal soldiers courtship or, Constant Peggy's kind answer. Being her resolution to forsake her friends, and venture to the wars with her beloved souldier. To a pleasant new tune. Licensed according to order.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,
notes: Place and range of dates supplied by Wing.
Verse: Upon the banks of Ireland,.
In four columns, with a woodcut illustration above each column.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
